question: 乗客
sourceMnemonic: If you take a <kanji>ride</kanji> as a <kanji>guest</kanji> (or a <kanji>customer</kanji>), that makes you a <vocabulary>passenger</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You hopefully learned the on'yomi for <ja>乗</ja> with the word <ja>乗馬</ja>, but here's a mnemonic to help you just in case:

A <vocabulary>passenger</vocabulary> gets on at the next stop. Who is it? It's <reading>Jou</reading>rm (<ja>じょう</ja>), the farmhand.
